input.sentences: at the location | an award was given to a member .
military officials proudly stand next to the important man .

output.sentences: A politician received an extravagant award for his work.
He and his wife posed with members of the military.
He met with another politician and shook his hand.
A moment later, his wife introducer herself to him as well.
The watching crowd was very pleased with what they saw.
